roleset.name: help, make feel better, ease, get rid of

role.descr: thing eased, gotten rid of; relief from what

example.name: Example with args 1 and 2
example.text: Senate and House bills to provide special casualty-loss treatmentand other tax relief for timber growers in the hurricane disasterareas
example.arg: for timber growers in the hurricane disaster areas

example.name: Slightly different arg 1
example.text: this and other deadline relief for Hugo 's victims

example.name: When you may be tempted to use an arg 0
example.text: They provide relief for poor farmers

roleset.note: Roleset based on relieve.01. Corresponds to Verbnet class cheat-10.6, free-80-1 and amuse-31.1. Updated by Julia
